resources.string: Thank you for watching our sponsors and the important info they shared with you. please patronize these sponsors since they are paying to keep fare costs down while giving a better income to your driver, you are entitled to special discounts for participating.If you would like more information on these special discounts, please tap the flowing \'YES\' button and we\'ll follow up with an email that includes your personal discounts.
Welcome! • this platform is brought to you on behalf of your Lyft driver
• in order to keep fares down but at the same time assist your drivers with a better income for sharing their car, they have authorized the presentation of this programing and promotional material
• the businesses who make this possible thank you for your participation and we ask that you patronize them
• additional promotinal discounts, for more savings, will be presented to you at the end of your trip
• if you have any further questions or suggestions please email us at varaplatformtest@gmail.com
• thank you for your participation, the VARA team
